pullRequest.title: Fixed oauth server login UI screen issues
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed oauth server login UI screen issues.
Fixed login screen text, elements alignment.
Updated new loader.
Updated error page.

Issues addressed:

[Participant Manager] Sign In - UI/text issues #993
UI issue - Sign in screen #1202
[Mobile apps] Hydra > UI of Signin screen is broken #1836
Signin screen > text changes for forgot password #1890

Please find below screen shots.

commit.message:
Fixed oauth login UI screen issues

Fixed oauth login UI screen issues
loader, error page image,

Fixed build issue-test failure

Fixed build issue-test failure
